hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #9# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the castle guards' routes have major security vulnerabilities.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Epona's Song#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Mido's house#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Saria).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.
